operation.title: Operation
operation.description: Explicit operation to perform: "create", "read", "update", "delete", or "find". If not specified, operation will be inferred from context: has fieldDataJson + recordId = update, has fieldDataJson only = create, has recordId only = read, has searchTerm/filtersJson = find, has recordId only (no data/search) = delete.

fieldDataJson.title: Field Data JSON
fieldDataJson.description: JSON string containing Case field data. For create: {"Subject":"Product issue","Status":"New"}. For update: {"Status":"Closed","Priority":"High"}. For bulk operations: [{"Subject":"Issue 1"},{"Subject":"Issue 2"}]. Required for create/update operations. The agent should construct this JSON from natural language user input.

recordId.title: Record ID
recordId.description: The Salesforce record ID (15 or 18 character) of the Case. Required for read/update/delete operations. Format: 18-character ID like "500xx000003DGbYAAW". For update, can be omitted if CaseNumber is provided in fieldDataJson for automatic resolution. The agent should resolve this from case subject/number when possible rather than asking the user for an ID.

searchTerm.title: Search Term
searchTerm.description: Text to search for in Case fields (Subject, Description, etc.). Used for find operations. Example: "Product issue" or "billing". IMPORTANT: If the user wants to find a case but hasn't provided a search term, ask them for the case subject, case number, or other identifying information BEFORE calling this action. Do not call find operation without a searchTerm or filtersJson.

filtersJson.title: Filters JSON
filtersJson.description: JSON string of exact-match filters for find operations. Can be single object {"fieldApiName":"Status","value":"New"} or array [{"fieldApiName":"Status","value":"New"}]. IMPORTANT: If the user wants to find a case but hasn't provided specific filters, ask them for details like case number, account name, or status BEFORE calling this action. Do not call find operation without a searchTerm or filtersJson.

searchLimit.title: Search Limit
searchLimit.description: Maximum number of records to return for find operations (default: 5, max: 20).

accountName.title: Account Name
accountName.description: Account name to resolve to AccountId for the Case. If provided, the system will search for an Account with this name and link the Case to it.

contactNameOrEmail.title: Contact Name or Email
contactNameOrEmail.description: Contact name or email to resolve to ContactId for the Case. If provided, the system will search for a Contact and link the Case to them.

confirm.title: Confirm
confirm.description: For create/update: Set to false to preview only without committing. Default (true): Commits immediately. For delete: Set to true to actually delete. Default (false): Returns confirmation message first. The agent should first call delete with confirm=false, ask the user, then call again with confirm=true if confirmed.
